sentences.sContent: "The colonnade is a highly allegorical artistic representation of an ecumenical embrace of the universal Church to all people, " said the Vatican newspaper.
sentences.sContent_eng: "The colonnade is a highly allegorical artistic representation of an ecumenical embrace of the universal Church to all people, " said the Vatican newspaper.
sentences.sCn: 梵蒂冈日报称，广场的柱廊是一种高度的艺术表现形式，喻意着大教堂对所有人的接纳。

synos.tran: 普遍的；世界范围的；全基督教的

remMethod.val: “一口闷” → 把世界一口闷下 → 世界范围的

words.tran: 泛基督教主义；普世教会主义
